detaileddescription.para: Внутренне представление лексем (tok) Если tok=0, то представления нет

memberdef.name: SYSTEM_table
memberdef.initializer: = { { "program", PROGRAMM }, { "var", VAR }, { "const", CONST }, { "integer", INTEGER }, { "real", REAL }, { "array", ARRAY }, { "of", OF }, { "true", TRUE }, { "false", FALSE }, { "", 0 } }

memberdef.name: OPERATORS_table
memberdef.initializer: = { { "if", IF }, { "then", THEN }, { "else", ELSE }, { "while", WHILE }, { "do", DO }, { "for", FOR }, { "to", TO }, { "downto", DOWNTO }, { ":=", ASSIGNMENT }, { "read", READ}, { "write", WRITE }, { "writeln", WRITELN }, { "begin", BEGIN }, { "end", END }, { "", 0 } }
